title: Vicente Amado Olivo Bridges Machine Learning and Science of Science at ICSSI
short_description: Who's Behind the Paper? Machine learning enables the disambiguation of author identities in expanding research fields.

content.1_para: Our graduate student [vicente_amado] attended the 3rd International Conference on the Science of Science and Innovation (ICSSI) on July 1 - 3, at the National Academy of Sciences in Washington, DC. This interdisciplinary conference brought together leading experts in the field of science of science and innovation, providing a multi-channel platform to bring together both producers (scientists from industry and academia) and consumers (policymakers, publishers, funders, administrators, etc.) of the field. Vicente presented his work in identifying unique researchers from the literature utilizing machine learning to solve the author ambiguity challenge.
